entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [native aot] Unhandled exceptions are not printed to console #91298
  • NativeAOT Checked smoke tests are taking a long time #91296
  • System.Windows.Extensions.dll included in Linux SDK output #91288
  • Request to support W3C TraceContext Level 2: Setting "random traceid flag" in tracecontext #91282
    9.0.0
  • [mono] Intrinsify Vector4 #91278
    9.0.0
  • Json: HandleNull property has misleading value for structs when not overridden explicitly in the converter #91275
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: TypeDiscriminatorPropertyName Reuse existing property #91274
    Future
  • Assertion failed '!(checkUnusedValues && def->IsUnusedValue()) && "operands should never be marked as unused values"' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #91273
    8.0.0
  • IExternalScopeProvider API is not 'performance-friendly' #91268
    Future
  • Activity.Current does not reset to null if entry span stops/disposes before child spans causing all subsequent activities to share the same trace id #91265
    9.0.0
  • SPMI asmdiff errors on Arm64 Linux #91257
  • Searching with empty attribute value results in an invalid filter error #91255
    Future
  • Add DebuggerTypeProxy for ListDictionaryInternal #91254
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 3 Regressions on 8/25/2023 8:20:08 PM #91280
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 1 Regression on 8/20/2023 5:37:20 PM #91281
  • Bad codegen for Vector64.Dot leads to wrong output #91252
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'curSize < maxSplitSize' during 'Emit code' #91251
  • System.IO.Compression.Brotli not supported on Blazor webassembly, Can we support System.IO.Compression.Brotli #91279
    Future
  • Mono build disables required warning C4244 under MSVC #91249

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Modify static abstract interfaces for functions #90744
  • Class serialized to an empty array [] with System.Text.Json #91155
  • Config binding gen omits a needed comma in an emitted Configure overload replacement #91258
    8.0.0
  • Incorrect nullable annotation on Validator.TryValidateValue's `value`? #91162
    8.0.0
  • NegotiateAuthentication larger code size and also brings in BigInteger #90898
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Allow Setting Proxy for HttpClient Instance Used for CRL Checks #90363
  • [net8.0-ios] App crashes on ios device when calling static abstract generic interface method #90732
    8.0.0
  • [mono] Full AOT error: Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/mini/method-to-ir.c:6456, condition `!sig->has_type_parameters' not met #91066
    8.0.0
  • Type and content inconsistency between TcpClient.Client.LocalEndPoint/RemoteEndPoint and TcpConnectionInformation.LocalEndPoint/RemoteEndPoint #91137
  • File operations are not in case sensitive on cross-platform (i.e. Linux) #91250
  • Test crashes on System.Net.Security Test Suite #91014
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Perf pipeline broken - `Package 'Iced 1.17.0'` - `The package integrity check failed.` #91248
  • Scoped service working out of a scope. #91243
  • Assertion failed 'node->IsUnusedValue() && "found an unmarked unused value"' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #91173
    8.0.0
  • [Test Failure]: System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.TelemetryTest_Http30.EventSource_ConnectionPoolAtMaxConnections_LogsRequestLeftQueue #90603
    8.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.HttpRequestException: A connection attempt failed because the connected party did not properly respond after a period of time, or established connection failed because connected host has failed to respond. #91052
    9.0.0
  • Http: ActivityHeadersPropagator=null suppresses HttpClient tracing #90407
    9.0.0
  • IPV6 stack is required for .NET 6 and WSL #90543
    9.0.0
  • What are the minimum required files to deploy a Mono 6 console app on macOS? #91167
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT] Fix formatting or assertion failures and fail-fasts #91300
    needs-area-label
  • Add support for 128-bit integers to BitConverter #91299
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Reenable consumption of PGO data #91297
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] [wasm] Request Streaming upload #91295
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Remove fixed bug from issues.targets #91294
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Fix nullable annotation for Validator.TryValidateValue and ValidateValue #91293
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Mono] Fix offset calculation for nested struct, when pinvoke is enabled #91292
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix Dispose and SendData Race on Http3 Test #91291
    area-System.Net.Http, test-enhancement
  • Improve perf of ActivatorUtilities.CreateInstance() #91290
    tenet-performance, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Add error message for loading assembly with incompatible architecture #91289
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Ensure the relevant containable nodes are handled #91287
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump Microsoft.Private.Intellisense package version #91285
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Start sharing code between ILLink/ILCompiler test infra #91284
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix crash when calling AssemblyLoadContext.Unload twice #91283
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Fix illegal IR created by GetElement/ToScalar lowering #91272
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add optimisation of incrementing SELECT at lowering on arm64. #91262
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Type load checks do not fail at compile time but produce a runtime exception #91261
    area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix multireg promotion on arm64 #91260
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [release/8.0] [browser] Add `EmccMaximumHeapSize` to define maximum memory #91277
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Add boolean field to indicate whether or not the Windows thread pool is being used #91246
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [browser] download sequence optimization #91201
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [Mono] Disable failing test tracing/runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource #91269
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-mono, 8.0.0
  • Windows executables: only load imported DLLs from System32 #89311
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Code cleanup: remove unused code in debugger patch skip logic #91230
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix nullable annotation for Validator.TryValidateValue and ValidateValue #91286
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations
  • [release/8.0] [Mono] Fix unsafe accessor related issue for full AOT #91270
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Fix unsafe accessor related issue for full AOT #91216
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix implementation of NegotiateAuthentication.Wrap for Kerberos on Windows #91152
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [mono] Extend mono_gsharedvt_constrained_call JIT icall to handle static virtual methods #91059
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] JIT: Fix various HW intrinsic lowerings for unused values #91266
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Add Retry and Task.Delay to WinHttpHandler AfterReadResponseServerError_ClientWrite test #91271
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Remove AD0001 NoWarn from Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions project #91236
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • Fix UseManagedNtlm linker substitutions #90957
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • add test for SslClientAuthenticationOptions.ShallowClone #88557
    area-System.Net.Security, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • catch closing exception in HttpListener #91234
    area-System.Net
  • [browser] Add `EmccMaximumHeapSize` to define maximum memory #91256
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Fix more warnings #91259
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [RISC-V] Fix MarshalStructAsLayoutSeq #90719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [Mono] Disable failing test tracing/runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource #91226
    area-Tracing-mono
  • JIT: Fix various HW intrinsic lowerings for unused values #91213
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove test exclusion #91253
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow for PublishAot and PublishSingleFile at the same time #91141
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Disable objc_msgSend stubs in clang for compatibility with Xcode 13 #91118
    Servicing-approved, os-mac-os-x, area-Infrastructure, os-ios, os-tvos, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Disable objc_msgSend stubs in clang for compatibility with Xcode 13 #91117
    Servicing-approved, os-mac-os-x, area-Infrastructure, os-ios, os-tvos, 7.0.x
  • [mono] Fix unused variable warnings #91212
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • SPMI: Fix accumulation of repro files #91194
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove unnecessary JIT workarounds in Utf8 transcoding #91193
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • Add check that tests are public #89554
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Http2 MultiConnection test race conditions #91156
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Check for generic structs in "needs marshalling" check #90836
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [JIT] Fold some bitwise operations to vpternlog #91227
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Test hot/cold splitting in runtime-coreclr crossgen2 pipeline #91217
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • NativeAOT SuperPMI collections #91037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] [browser] Update browser template to use Wasm SDK #91046
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Enable trimming for crossgen2 publishing and fix symbol bug #91135
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] UMEntryThunkCode::Poison() #91221
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Make handling of DefaultCredentials in NegotiateAuthentication/SocketsHttpHandler more consistent #91160
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2255487 #91242
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Use live illink to trim framework #91233
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • GC finalization cleanup #91129
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Revert "Baseline Native AOT tests (#86366)" #90184
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add New Test to Track Number of Jitted Methods #91235
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [DependencyInjection] introduce feature switch to disable S.R.E #91133
    tenet-performance, os-android, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Upgrade our TFM to net9.0 #90880
    area-Infrastructure
  • [mono][metadata] Replace use of mem manager lock with loader lock #91190
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove some manual test scaffolding #89653
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Wraping both declaration and definition in #ifndef DISABLE_LOGGING. #91042
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Emit interceptor info correctly when invocation expr is on separate line #91218
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Remove implicit narrowing conversions from zlib #91245
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Adding a naive implementation of various primitive tensor operations #91228
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add comments to binding gen tests for invocations on new lines #91237
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Enable SuperPMI collection of a libraries tests run #91101
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] wasm symbols #91241
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add package readmes #91210
    area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • Switch to python generated source #91140
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove some unused headers and functions #91177
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Address feedback from config binding gen PR to improve enum parsing #89952
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [mono][jit] Optimize OP_R8CONST and OP_R4CONST on Arm64 #91225
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Ability to request stackwalk per EventPipe session #84077
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add blazor startup measurements to browser-bench #91199
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • avoid allocations for TLS handshake #87874
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] Do not OCSP staple invalid OCSP responses #90552
    area-System.Net.Security
  • BigInteger constructor perf #91176
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Trim XmlSerializers codegen if unsupported #88796
    area-Serialization, linkable-framework, community-contribution
  • Improve CopySign performance for integer types #90970
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [WIP] source-build: don't skip building Native Aot artifacts. #88520
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Support Windows based ECDSA SignedCms #91247
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Internal CLR error on 7.0.307 and 7.0.400 SDK #34998
  • EmbeddedFileProvider can't get any file when RootNamespace diffrence to AssemblyName #34988

Closed

  • System.IO.IOException: Read-only file system when running "workload install" command #34697
  • 7.0.400 break: dotnet test fails on linux+mono #34986

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35023
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create project templates target to 9.0 #34996
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2254685 #34992
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #34991
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Containers: prefer starting the app using 'dotnet <assembly.dll>'. #34863
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [release/8.0] Update IsTargetFrameworkCompatible check #34954
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK
  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #34394
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Validate this extension methods and member types in APICompat #34999
    Servicing-approved, Area-ApiCompat
  • Allow ArtifactsPath telemetry to flow #34978
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add internal _UseManagedNtlm feature switch #34903
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #34990
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Enable Windows thread pool config switch via Project file #34943
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #34898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Fix CanSortByDownloadCountAndThenByName test by using CurrentCulture … #34893
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Download tool packages from NuGet feeds directly, instead of implicitly restoring #33835
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2255579 #34880
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add test for PublishSingleFile+PublishAot #34948
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Change containers publish target to require IsPublishable (and explicit SDK Container support) #34980
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Prefer docker tool when both podman and docker are present #34909
    Area-Containers, 8.0.1xx
  • Added JavaScript import after #34983
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Add better error messages when we can't fetch manifests #34460
    untriaged, Area-Containers, 8.0.1xx
  • Add ProjectCapability for Native AOT properties. #34485
    untriaged, Area-ILLink

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Getters of unreferenced properties get optimized out #69757
  • InlineHints are unreadable in Windows High Contrast mode #69755
  • Can completion items with type/template params fill in <> and hold cursor in between the brackets? #69754
    Backlog
  • IntelliSense fails to capture enclosing local variables when editing a lambda expression, which persists when editing other non-lambda files in C#. #69753
    17.8 P4

Closed

  • static lambda's still have a target #69758
  • Incorrect error formatting for generic attribute missing errors #69700
    17.8
  • Ensure HasAnonymousFunctionConversion returns without binding lambda body for explicitly-typed lambda #69093
    17.8

PullRequests

Created

  • Lazily build a case-insensitive comparison for performance #69756
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update "Current Document" background analysis semantics #69750
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Bail out for primary constructor parameters in IDE0059 analyzer #69748
    Area-IDE, IDE-CodeStyle, untriaged, Feature - IDE0059

Merged

  • Followup PR to https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/69677 to reduce allocations further. #69746
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Pool lexed token arrays in SyntaxParser. #69499
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to main #69707
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Update PublishData.json #69752
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge main into release/dev17.8 for snap #69744
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, untriaged
  • fixing error formatting for generic attribute missing errors #69735
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Bind fully-typed lambda only once for error recovery #69695
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Pass project file name when building before running tests #69743
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Enable the test method finder to find tests in nested classes. #69716
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update configs for 17.8 P3 #69741
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Add restricted IVT to Intellicode #69742
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Work around restore issue #69710
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use raw strings in EditorFeatures tests #69729
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Run design time builds out-of-process #69616
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Trim ToString calls when converting to interpolated strings when there are interpolated string handlers available. #69723
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [17.7] Cache substituted base type #69635
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.7
  • Collection expression conversions: check elements are convertible #69627
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8
  • Report missing diagnostic for typeless expression in binary operation #69727
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve GetNextToken / GetPreviousToken perf #69740
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.4 #69648
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update the C# syntax generator to use a few more modern C# constructs. #69703
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Exclude BCL binaries in Roslyn ServiceHub vsix #69239
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add extra validation for Compilations having the expected trees #69747
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid reusing ref receiver temp #67955
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Locals and Returns, untriaged
  • Reduce cascading diagnostics on failed implicit conversion #69170
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve generic type argument list error recovery #69734
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Analyzers are tied to `Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web` making them unavailable in ASP.NET Core library projects #50414
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting perf counters are slow #50412
  • FromQueryAttribute with Name does not work when added to property of an object with AsParametersAttribute #50408
  • Perf regression: plainTextEmptyFilter #50405
  • Blazor dotnet 8 preview 7 - Unexpected IDisposable.Dispose() #50404
  • Test crash in Libuv.FunctionalTests on (Alpine.314.Amd64.Open)Ubuntu.2004.Amd64.Open in 6.0 #50403
  • Add validation to test that OOB packages have no SharedFx-only references #50402
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Make PropertyNameCaseInsensitive available for JSON->gRPC transcoding #50401
  • Kestrel HTTPS: Incorrect behavior when missing access to private key on Windows #50400
  • Dockerise ASP.NET Core app with Alpine image #50399
  • Endpoint information available before calling UseRouting() #50393
  • it is possible to use the [Authorize] attribute in Blazor controllers #50392
  • Templates for previous frameworks are not available on .NET 8 (nightly) rc builds #50390

Closed

  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Grpc.Swagger Package Version #50176
  • Components E2E failure - error EnableGenerateDocumentationFile #49960
  • restore failed, error CS9057: Analyzer assembly #49658
  • Memory Leak on .Net 7 but not 6 #50097
  • Leading @ should not be required in attribute value when specifying render mode using @rendermode #49443
  • Differential response mechanism for Blazor enhanced navigation, utilizing a configurable page store. #50329
  • Quarantine CanStartAndStopConnectionUsingGivenTransport #49315
  • Blazor time to first UI regression: blazorwasmbenchmark #50157
    8.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix incoming connections with same ID sometimes failing incorrectly #50417
    area-signalr
  • Fix typo in method name StopTrasnsportTracking -> StopTransportTracking #50416
    community-contribution, area-networking, area-runtime
  • Update Microsoft.IdentityModel to 7.0.0-preview4 #50415
    area-infrastructure
  • Suppress nullability warning when resolving JSON body or service #50410
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Fix dropping messages on reconnect #50409
    area-signalr
  • Rename internal UseAck to UseStatefulReconnect #50407
    area-signalr
  • Fix local build file modification #50387
    area-mvc

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50386
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, 9.0-preview1
  • Revert "[automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' (#50281)" #50406
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Don't display the reconnection dialog after an error occurs #50381
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • Fix error message in CodeCheck file #50375
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0-rc2

Updated

  • Call AddMetrics inside AddRouting #50168
    area-networking, area-routing, 8.0-rc2
  • Update SDK to 9.0.100-alpha.1.23421.9 #49911
    area-infrastructure
  • Add feature to expose IIS hosting details #50128
    area-networking
  • Persist Prerendered State #50373
    area-blazor
  • HttpLogging redaction and enrichment #50163
    area-middleware, 8.0-rc2
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2255272 #49575
    area-mvc
  • Fix corrupted streaming SSR output #50380
    area-blazor, .NET 8 Planning
  • SignalR MessageBuffer fixes #50315
    area-signalr
  • Try Adding Suport for XForwardedPort #50338
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Enable build acceleration #50205
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • refactor : Remove unwanted area specific `editorconfig`. #50211
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-29

Issues

Closed

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NavigationPage bar gets stuck and stops updating its title #17083
  • Maui Hybrid: build fails when adding json file to ./Resources/Raw #17078
  • Can't connect Visual Studio with Mac due to microsoft.net.sdk.ios.manifest v16.4.7098 missing from nuget.org #17077
  • What should be done to make Maui WebView renders last page instead of home page of the domain when web token expires? #17065

  • Horizontal scrolling causes elements to become focused on Android #17060
  • Flyout RightToLeft is not working on Android #17057
  • Delay in BackgroundColor update for Button in Release mode #17056

    .NET 8 GA
  • Some images are not shown on Windows #17054
  • Entry background color does not change when two radio buttons change event. #17053
  • FlyoutBackgroundImage not shown when compiled with 'WindowsMachine' #17052
  • CollectionView sets the wrong height for items containing long word-wrapped text inside a * column #17050
  • Memory leaks - After running 24 hours it crashes #17049

Closed

  • Shell.SetTabBarIsVisible is not working WinUI #14969
    .NET 8 GA

    .NET 8 GA
  • Net 8 Preview VS Installer - No such option #17051
  • HotReload not working for changes to VerticalOptions #10122
    Backlog
  • Removing maximize button causes the close button to move from the right to the left #16662
    Backlog
  • IsFocused does not return to false when a DatePicker loses focus in iOS #10875
    Backlog
  • HorizontalTextAlignment="Center" is not working for Lable when android:supportsRtl in AndroidManifest is false #17047

Created

    .NET 8 GA
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1901.177 to 1.0.1938.49 #17059
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk from 17.7.1 to 17.7.2 #17058
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Add .NET 7 to the NuGet packages #17048

Merged

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • FREETEXT search on a ntext column not working #31583
  • Generated SQL has syntax issue when doing GroupJoin with Union constructed query #31580
  • Cannot check if owned entity is null using Cosmos DB provider #31579
  • VB.NET generated sql WHERE statement issue #31578
  • Filtering on fields that have conversion do not convert correctly when using "IN" operator #31577

Closed

  • Setting a default value to a binary field causes an "everlasting" migration #31330
    8.0.0-rc1
  • what is the best way to add our own namespace while generating the model via Scaffolding #30332
    8.0.0-rc2
  • Method for Latest EF core compatible with .NET framework >4.5 #31564
  • EF Core 7.0 memory leak in ASP.NET Core API application but not in Console application #31576
  • HierarchyId as primary key, all examples with path strings, but how idiomatic add an entity under another. #31563

PullRequests

Created

  • SQLite: Fix casting between int and char #31585
  • Validate complex properties are not null when saving #31584
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #31582
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • Minor changes resulting from PG sync work to rc1 #31581
  • Scaffolding: Add usings for UseProvider call #31573

Updated

  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Use aggregate_context instead of user_state in CreateAggregate #31531
